BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Disabilities and Addiction

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to removing outdated clinical language, and to repeal paragraph 2 of subdivision a of section 555 of such charter in relation to a report on the establishment of the department of health and mental hygiene
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Removing outdated clinical language, and to repeal paragraph 2 of subdivision a of section 555 of such charter in relation to a report on the establishment of the department of health and mental hygiene.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to establishing an office of community mental health
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing an office of community mental health.
